slave
Class Responder

java.lang.Object
  slave.Responder

public class Responder
extends java.lang.Object

The responder class responds to the LCP requests sent by the Communicator class. Uses RS-485.

The first version of this class (as seen in the git commit logs) show that this class used the built in functions already provided in LEJOS. However, the built in functionality turned out to be unreliable and we have rewrote the functionality. This has greatly improved the reliability of the communication between the two classes.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
This program has a main as it is to be loaded on the slaveNXT brick. This is the main program that occurs on the slave.

It will start the RemoteUltrasonicPoller and the NXTRemoteControl

Parameters:
args - This is the default constructor, not needed.
